page.title: 19Crane Moor 6
page.content: Every summer in the recreation field as the school breaks up for the long summer holiday the Village Association organises a big Gala. We have stalls and games,pop,ice-cream,plants,toys,tombol a,go-carts,cocoanut shy,a bouncing castle,swing-boats,refreshments and toilets are in the school. In the middle of the field is an arena where the parade comes when it has walked through the village. Someone important is invited to open the Gala and then the fancy dress competition is judged. Everyone from the village and lots from other places come and it finishea when the raffle is drawn. The Village Association has been using the money to make the recreation field better.
